title: The Search for Nancy Guthrie: A Kidnapping Mystery
summary: Nancy Guthrie, an 84-year-old woman from Arizona, went missing from her home. Her family last saw her on January 31 after dinner and games. The next day, she didn't go to church, so they reported her missing. Authorities think she was kidnapped because they found her blood on the porch and her doorbell camera was turned off. Nancy has a pacemaker and needs medicine, so everyone is worried about her health. Police are looking for clues, like ransom notes, but haven't found a suspect yet. Neighbors are helping by sharing camera videos. The search continues to bring Nancy home safely.

background_read: This story is about a real-life mystery in Arizona. Nancy Guthrie is an elderly woman who disappeared from her home. Kidnapping means someone is taken against their will, which is a serious crime. Police and family are working hard to find her because she needs medical care. It shows how communities can come together to help in emergencies.

WHAT: She was kidnapped from her home, and there is a search to find her.
WHERE: In Arizona, near Tucson, in a desert neighborhood.
